title: Nutriota Propolis | 1000 mg (180 Tablets)
aboutContent: Natural Immune System Booster - Bee Propolis is one of nature's richest sources of bioflavonoids, making it the ultimate natural defender. Bee propolis is the natural yet simple booster that has been used for centuries to treat sore throats and other ailments. PURE AND NATURAL: Our propolis tablets are made with high-quality bee propolis extract and do not contain any artificial additives.
descriptionContent: Propolis, which is a natural product derived from bees and an herbal solution for health, is collected from shoots and trees by bees. It has gained popularity in the field of health and wellness because it contains tree resin, essential oils, wax and bioflavonoids, whose antioxidant effect will help maintain the health of the immune system. Bee propolis also contains useful minerals (such as calcium, magnesium and zinc), amino acids and important vitamins such as B1, B2 and vitamin C.
ingredientsContent: Propolis resin, microcrystalline cellulose (bulking agent), croscarmellose sodium (disintegrating agent), magnesium stearate (anti-caking agent), hydroxypropylmethylcellulose (frosting agent), silicon dioxide (anti-caking agent), glycerin (icing agent), carnauba wax (agent of frosting), allergens: Tree Resin
generalInfoContent:
Manufacturer: Nutriota
Manufacturer reference: ES/PROPOLIS/TABLETS
Package Dimensions: 11.1 x 5.7 x 5.6 cm; 140 g
ASIN: B09FFFSX3K
